channel.title: [PI] Adding a ::curses command help

item.title: [PI] Adding a ::curses command help
item.dc:creator: @jmk600 jmk600
item.description:
@jmk600 wrote:

Alright. This is my command.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("curses") && c.isDonator >= 1) { c.altarPrayed = 0; c.setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); c.getCurse().resetCurse(); } else { c.altarPrayed = 1; c.setSidebarInterface(5, 22500); c.getCombat().resetPrayers(); }else if (c.isDonator == 0){ c.sendMessage("You need to be a Donator to use this command."); }

Here is my error:

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:199: 'else' without 'if' }else if (c.isDonator == 0){ ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Please help.

Rep++ if helped.

Read full topic
